website_summaries.verdict: A very effective soap for treating fungal conditions for most.
pros: Consumers with a variety of fungal and bacterial skin conditions report this soap provides excellent results
It also stands out for being invigorating
Cleanses well while being gentle on skin
Gentle enough to be used daily
Made with no synthetic fragrances or dyes
cons: A few felt the scent was too strong and it may not work for all skin conditions

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! I got ringworm at the gym. My Dr told me to put athletes foot cream on it and it would take 3-4 weeks to heal. I did that and decided to purchase this soap to help. My ringworm cleared up in 2 weeks. Within one week it was immensely better! These photos show 2 weeks of healing. My boyfriend uses it on his toe nail fungus too and they have shown improvement. This is a great product and the company is very helpful and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: arascop

customer_reviews.title: ... versicolor and have tried every over the counter thing recommended by the internet
customer_reviews.text: I have tinea versicolor and have tried every over the counter thing recommended by the internet, different types of athletes foot medication, dandruff shampoo, to little avail. The spots are still there. But after using this product the spots immediately faded after one use and when I use it daily they don't show themselves at all. When I feel them coming on after a hot day I use it and feel better immediately. There is a bit of a scent to it that isn't necessarily bad, just a little strong.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Really gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year, maybe two, get it auto delivered every 2 months. The time before last I thought the product had changed, a lot less of the tea tree scent, and it didn't seem to be very thick. The most recent bottle I got is COMPLETELY different, it's basically just water with some kind of thickening agent - no smell, does NOT make ANY soapy bubbles, doesn't clean, doesn't have the tea tree smell - basically a complete waste of $15, $30 if you factor in the one from last time. I'll be finding a different soap company.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I'm very unhappy  and the product is not helping my condition like it has before.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item several times to help with my eczema because it is such a great product. However, my last purchase I am not happy with at all. The body wash seems to be watery, it does not lather and it isn't helping me. I am unhappy with my purchase. I thought I finally found the perfect solution to my eczema and I feel like I've been cheated out of product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the numerous positive reviews. I seem to have gotten a fungal infection from the gym equipment. I have been using this product for the past two weeks along with another high rated product called puyria wonder balm. The condition has actually gotten worst and I had to resort to the .88 cent clotrimazole cream from Walmart and I am finally seeing signs of healing. Disappointed much.
customer_reviews.author: Mig.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, you might be scratching your skin for days until it bleed.
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely no known allergy, but after using this product for just a few days my skin got so itchy I have to scratch until it eventually bled. Only after lots of antihistamine and cortisone cream for more than a week it got back to normal. The seller did not acknowledge or shown genuine concern for the issue and insinuated that it is ALL MY FAULT not realizing there might be a possible side effect. Again I don't have any known allergy. What a waste of time and energy even trying to communicate.
customer_reviews.author: Jardin00

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It works indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I went to 5(!!!!!!) dermatologists for the last 2 years. I used so many prescribed creams and pills. Nothing worked for my rush. It itched so badly.... I was desperate to find alternative ways to treat my rush..I came across this product. I was sceptical. However, ordered it. It's only the second day I am using ( 6 treatments) and check my photos. So far I am beyond impressed. Itch stop and it looked almost headed. Still red but dammm can't believe.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but thought I would try it because it had good ratings. I found that it really does work. My feet and hands were peeling and now they are extremely soft. I will continue to use it just because. It smells great and leaves my hands and feel feeling clean and fresh. My only complaint is the packaging. The bottle is stiff and hard to squeeze. It might just be me, but thought the company should know.
customer_reviews.author: JanieK

customer_reviews.title: Hyperpigmentation
customer_reviews.text: It works okay, but it caused hyperpigmentation of my underarms area!! Who wants dark underarms! At first I thought maybe the product didn’t wash off but nope, my skin actually got darker! I don’t have a sensitive skin either I can usually use anything anywhere and I’m okay.. not sure why but this product gave me darker skin color! I was excited to use this based on the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Salman

customer_reviews.title: Caution-- may cause rash for you too.
customer_reviews.text: This might work for some people, but for me, it dried the skin and gave me an itchy rash. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: brenden d.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and I really prefer it over my regular body wash but the bottle is way too small for the price of this unfortunately. Had I known that it was so tiny, I wouldn't have purchased it at all to be honest. Photo to show the size comparison to my normal Dove body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mortar Wife

customer_reviews.title: Formulas Changes Regularly (Currently Less Effective)
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this product annually for the last four fews years and strongly recommended it to friends. From my latest order (Aug 19) I can say they noticeably changed the formula. The appearance and thickness of solution are visibly different, but more importantly it's now seemingly watered down and less effective (ineffective for me actually). I've switched to Lume as a deodorant and will explore other applications for the remainder of this bottle purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bath soap and great company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful body wash. Has a pleasant smell and it suds up really well on a shower poof or any other bath bathing product, such as a sponge, loofah etc. It has greatly improved the dryness and the texture of my skin. The customer service with the maker is top notch! I was contacted thru email from the maker on the suggested date of delivery to be sure all was well with the delivery. It was package very well without a possibility of leakage. In another email I received from them, she expressed interest in my satisfaction with the bath soap. I will be purchasing more of the soap and highly recommend the company. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLOTTE BLACKBURN

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Mold was growing underneath the cap. "Anti-fungal", pshhhhhh. Also did absolutely nothing to even relieve the itching, and it smelled like Pinesol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with yeast infections ladies! Instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have very very sensitive skin, I have struggled with stinky pits and feet and as a young female that really sucks! I have chronic yeast infections/vaginosis since I was a kid.. sorry if that is TMI but if it helps another girl I’m all for that & it is safe to put it in sensitive areas of your body, there are no harmful ingredients! This completely made my symptoms and infections subside and gave me instant relief! No more yeast infections, no more stinky pits or stinky night sweats! This stuff really kills fungus and bad bacteria, my skin has never felt or looked better! I tried many feminine washes but nothing helped! This was a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Jos

customer_reviews.title: Febuary 2019: Formula changed, now watered down
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this stuff for several years. Was really great, but as of January or February 2019, it seems they changed the formula and now it is much less effective (it seems less viscous, so maybe watered down?). Will probably have to start looking for a new product for athlete's foot :(
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Yes,a no perfume solution to skin problems...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the bacteria fighting property,especially during the hot weather.I ran out of the cream my Dermatologist gave me for bad chafing and redness. I decided to try this to kill bacteria first before I called her.This worked and I've been using it for most showers. I tried different body washes but I think they were too perfumed and I wasn't feeling clean.This is wonderful it leaves skin unscented,soft and deodorized.A bonus was the cleansing softness my feet have now.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: No Improvement At All
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this item would work for the acne I have on the back of my left & right shoulders. I am almost finished with the bottle & I don't see an improvement in my skin at all. The search for a effective acne treatment continues.
customer_reviews.author: Youtube: MidnightAndI

customer_reviews.title: Works for underarm care!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for underarm use as I can't use regular deodorant and have had to sort of piece together and odor routine. This is a great addition to that routine and I believe it really does work. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beth Martin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do a thing. Stick to azole type drugs for your fungal treatments
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Awful ingredients - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a skincare junkie and I've never had a whole body allergic reaction before, but there's a first time for everything, I guess! I checked out the ingredient list and this has SLS in it, as well as a bunch of oils that are known for being irritating to the skin. I don't consider myself to have sensitive skin and I don't have any allergies that I'm aware of but my skin haaaaated this product. I wish I had tried it sooner so I could have gotten a refund at least. I'm throwing the bottle (and the loofah I used with it) out.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: contact dermatitis!
customer_reviews.text: i tried this to get rid of my persistent lake rash in my groin area. yesterday my scrotum was super red, scaly and painful to touch. read the Wikipedia entry on tea tree oil and discovered that there is no clinical evidence of this working but that one of the side effects is contact dermatitis. i stopped using the tea tree oil and the dermatitis is calming down. off to the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Palamabron

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Have extremely dry feet so I thought I would use this to try and help combat that. Actually dried out my feet much worse, to the point were they started cracking and even started bleeding. Used for a week, and didn't see any benefits. Feet itch and are extremely dry after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nuss

customer_reviews.title: Powerfully scented! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Foot bathing is a new experience for me. I've been wearing sandals almost everyday for the past year and my feet are starting to get dry and cracked and itchy in places. I bought this Tree Oil after several weeks of bathing with water alone. The oil smells WONDERFUL. The amount of grime and exfoliate that this product discards off my feet is considerable. A double-plus - the strong scent seems to keep mosquitoes away as well when I have my doors open to the outside. I will definitely keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product given all the ingredients, and I think it did a fair job in handling the areas i needed to wash, but I can not handle the smell. You can really smell the oil of oregano in this, as a matter of fact one night my husband asked me what I was cooking! I don't think I will continue on with this particular product. But if I had a friend who needed something I would tell them about this product with a warning about the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tinea problems
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't real sure when I first bought this product because I have tried many things in the past to help alleviate my Tinea problems on my chest and neck. After using this for a couple of weeks this has all but gotten rid of my Tinea on my chest and neck and has greatly removed my other patches, I was going to wait a little longer to see if it completely cleared up all my ares but it has done far more that any other fungal wash that i have purchased in the past so I though I would review it now..
customer_reviews.author: R. V. Schittone Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I've used this 4 of 6 days since receiving it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this 4 of 6 days since receiving it and so far my tinea versicolor is reacting extremely well. I fully expect to finally be rid of these spots after 3 years of various medications and sprays. It also has cleared up my backne which is a bonus. Wish I had tried this before spending nearly $1k on oral antifungal meds and frequent liver tests for 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser for sensitive skin, including Eczema and minor fungal issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm a convert. This tea tree oil cleanser has been very effective for me. I have several sensitive skin issues, including eczema, allergic reactions to common cleansers, shaving creams, and antiperspirants, and a fungal-type issue with shaving. Using this cleanser with a washcloth or loofah has reduced my need for hydrocortisone and anti-fungals to practically zero. It also helps reduce odors, keeping me from even having to use deodorants at all further helping my skin. I would highly recommend trying it and seeing if it resolves these types of issues for you.
customer_reviews.author: Runningpie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Diabetic Skin Issues
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling a bit with keeping my skin moisturized and clean as a diabetic. A lot of body washes have ingredients that seem to dry my skin out even more, or worse, cause yeast infections in random places like under my nails. I started buying tea tree oil, which was helping, but was very potent. I started looking for something a bit more gentle, and I came across this body wash. Works wonderfully. I don't reek of tea tree oil after using it, and it's allowed me to cut down on using lotions. My nails haven't had any issues since using this product. Highly recommend if you're having fungal issues due to diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Sodium Laureth Sulfate &  Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this soap a couple of times and have been very happy. After my last purchase though, I noticed that it contains sodium laureth sulfate & sodium lauryl sulfate. There is concern about these ingredients being connected to cancer, neurotoxicity, organ toxicity, skin inflammation and endocrine interruption. I would not want to use a product that contains these ingredients on a long-term basis. Especially since they are #2 and #3 on the ingredients list, and things on an ingredients list are listed in the order of greatest content in a product. Going forward I will be looking for an organic tea tree wash or at least one that doesn't contain these chemical.
customer_reviews.author: GracieLou731

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for your nails, ladies.
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it said it would (and like everyone's reviews). I used this as a body wash after I got ringworm from the gym...But I will say, as a girl who gets her nails done - usually dip, but sometimes shellac - you need to be careful because this eats off the shiny top coat. I spend a lot on my nails, so I'll probably wear gloves from now on.
customer_reviews.author: calieskimo

customer_reviews.title: Great, effective product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It does what it claims for your feet and other areas prone to topical fungal infections. This is my second order and I forsee a long relationship with this product. One caveat, the bottle is not user-friendly. Purely Northwest - if you're going to put a cap on it specifically meant to be used by SQUEEZING the bottle then you need to make the bottle SQUEEZABLE! Good LORD you have to have the strength of Thor to squeeze this hard bottle. Please upgrade your packaging!!!
customer_reviews.author: AngeS

customer_reviews.title: Needs a new bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product would be a lot better if it were not so hard to actually squeeze the bottle to release the soap. Ironically, it would probably work on behalf of the seller, because customers would be able to consume more of their merchandise. The only thing I can recommend to purchasers is to transfer the product to another bottle. I am not aware of any real benefits derived from the product, but who knows, maybe it helped something I wasn't aware of. Other than the bottle, I did like using the product, but may find another brand unless they change the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I hate the smell of it.
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this body wash because i have skin condition require me to use Tea Tree Oil. I bought it and I also got a soap of Tea Tree Oil from another vendor. My impression so far, maybe it works but OMG did I hate the smell of it. It is too sticky for me. Between this and the Soap I would definitely use the soap that had good smell. I understand this is an Oil, but it act different from regular oils . I can't just use it and go out because I will stink. That is why i ended up applying to soap after it (which kind defeat the point of having it).
customer_reviews.author: Joe The Expert

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING! I was suffering from a reoccurring fungus issue ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! I was suffering from a reoccurring fungus issue and after just one usage of Antifungal Soap with Tea Tree Oil my symptoms were very much improved. I am very sure that with re-treatment of the affected area, my problem will be resolved. The added plus is that I felt like I had experienced a Spa Treatment with the soft skin and delightful clean Tea Tree scent. I am most appreciative of discovering such a great product that lives up to its description.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my tinea versicolor
customer_reviews.text: I had tinea versicolor around my chest area. I had it for around 1 year and did not know how to get rid of it . After using this product, as well as another antifungal cream, my tinea versicolor was completely gone. The last time I used this product was actually back in probably around March. In fact, I forgot I had tinea versicolor until I saw this on my recommendations, I felt the need to write a review since this product did help me out a lot back then.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Seriously works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a little over a month wanted to hit the one month mark before reviewing and all I can say is I wish I would’ve found this sooner! Fast acting. I’m not sure what kind of skin issue my feet have/had most likely athletes foot anyways the hotness of my feet calmed down, no more random itchiness, and my messed up fungal toe seems to be healing pretty fast! Not a bot, I like reading honest reviews and share my views on good products and luckily I found this one :D 2020 can suck it, I’ll (My toes) be ready for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Quality Check - Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite some time now and have it on subscription. My recent orders have been really bad, the product is extremely watered down and doesn't have any of its good qualities anymore. I would recommend not buying this product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhoora Kadya

customer_reviews.title: Works for acne
customer_reviews.text: This seems to keep my body smell at bay. Not that I was having issues with that. The reason I got it was for shoulder acne. I wear Kevlar body armor and polyester for work for 12 hours a day. My shoulder acne broke out like crazy. I’ve been using this for the last two weeks and it seems to be helping greatly. Also helps with the sweat smell too. It just doesn’t smell good initially, but that fades quickly after I put on deodorant and body spray. Works well, for body sent and especially acne. I would recommend to others. Give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Update: didn't realize that the old bottle o got from my dad was diluted so much that I thought this was supposed to be clear. Anyway, I've been using it at full strength for just under a week. I am very pleased. Old: I have been itching from head to toe lately. Unused this from head to toe and finally got some relief. Maybe 85 percent worth. I am pleased. I have only used it 3 times, hopefully it will continue to improve my condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: fighting fungi problems for 5 years.just keep coming back every 6 months.3 weeks now and the skin is looking good.going to use this product until the bottled is gone.2020,may,it comes and goes what to do.THINK OUT SIDE THE BOX check what I am eating.carrots,corn,honey,beard,fruit and butter all refinished sugar.replace the items with Brussels sprouts broccoli,cinnamon,oregano,garlic and lemons or lemon juice.use butter made yogurt on your food.use oregano oil In water 3drops x 2 a day or use oregano leaves, lemon juice and cinnamon in water.not bad and I drunk 2 glasses a day.I use the anti-fungal tea oil at night when I took a bath.in 3days it started going away and after 6days all most gone.
customer_reviews.author: greg edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this product though I have received 3 bottles of it! It is really wonderful I’ve always had foot odor issues in my childhood. I had resigned myself to wearing shoes with socks always, but since I’ve started using this I no longer have to wear socks. I can wear ballet flats, sandals whatever I want without worry about any odor. I love the smell of this product. It feels very clean and therapeutic on my skin. I really recommend using this product. The people who make this are also very responsive to critique and when one of my bottles came cracked they sent me a replacement without me even asking. They’re wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product suitable for dry, sensitive, acne-prone, allergic reaction-prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: No qualms here! I actually purchased this for my husband but ended up using it as well after he had good results. I have very sensitive skin! I am always very weary and cautious of any new product I use on my hair, face and body (especially when purchasing virtually). I have combination skin that is both acne-prone and reaction-prone. However, this product has given me ZERO issues to have to deal with!! I will say that I'm not certain of its anti-fungal, ect. effectiveness as we don't use it quite regularly enough for that purpose to say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Used for large wart in side of face
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I got this for discolored toenails (Athletes foot). I had a large wart on the side of my face. When going out I would put a bandaid over it, so people would not be grossed out. Went to doctor to freeze it. But 3 weeks later still there. Decided to put a drop on the bandaids. 5 days later gone. Rectangular reddish area on side of face (where tea oil drop soaked bandage). Reddish rectangle became dry skin and sloughed off days later. I will try it out on another wart. But so no 1/4"x1/2" retangular reddish area - will just use a tiny piece of cotton with bandage tape. Will edit this post with results.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly clean feeling!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely take the time to write reviews but I felt I needed to share about this amazing product! I am a runner in TX where you are going to sweat during a run, even in winter. I purchased this to use in the shower after my runs. Even though the smell isn’t the best, the cleanliness I feel after using the product is amazing! I don’t have any skin issues so I can’t testify to helping with those. But I do own a day care and am around 12 children all day long and I feel this product takes care of any germs I encounter with them daily!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Life changing for your skin
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. Gosh. This body wash is magical on so many levels. It has cleaned up my cystic acne after only one week. Whenever I shave my legs I am not getting ingrown hairs. I am on my second bottle and it’s been a life saver for me. The smell is nice and not overwhelming. My skin feels so soft after each wash. The best part is, a little goes a long way. It’s been a life changing body wash for me. I wish I could hug the human that made it.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Bacne Be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this along with some medicated face washes from Dr. Song and all three of these products together have greatly diminished my bacne that I've struggled with for years. I've only been using them all for two weeks now, and I leave them on, individually, while I'm bathing. But I highly recommend this product if you battle with skin problems like mine. All the painful breakouts are gone and healed after the second week of using. And I've tried so many expensive washes, vitamins, medications, etc. for nothing to work, but this has. Also, I really love the way it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Laken H.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I have been dealing with yeast. In the summer months the sweat that collects under my breasts and groin make it easy for yeast to grow. I have been using this for almost two weeks and I no longer have a yeast problem. I struggled with itchy areas and the itching is gone. Im buying it again and hope not to run out!
customer_reviews.author: Pascale O

customer_reviews.title: Took Care of My Fungal Infection for Good
customer_reviews.text: I was dealing with a fungal infection that began on my torso and spread quickly to my upper legs and arms. I tried home-remedies like turmeric, which didn't seem to have an effect. After a week of a drug store topical anti-fungal, I only saw a slight improvement, so I stopped the cream, started this body wash, and the infection was gone within a week, skin imperfections cleared up a couple weeks after. I'm still using the body wash, I would strongly recommend it as a safe way to get your skin healthy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but suddenly price marked up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a week before and found value in this product. The price point was perfect for my budget and needs. There was no advertisements indicating the amount sold was a promotion. I have to wash my feet twice a day from hyperhidrosis so due to slowed postage from the recent virus pandemic, I ordered some back up to endure I would have some as needed. I burn through my soap supplies quickly . In less than a week I received one bottle for the same price as two a week before. Disappointed. So now I have to decide if I want to continue this product or find something more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WORKS WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders for my husbands feet. He has had athletes feet for YEARS! He would kill me if I posted a before picture. But the doctors gave him RX but nothing worked. So bought this on humbug but after a few days of him using this EVERY day and using a pumice stone his feet and no longer peeling because of fungus making his feet look scaly. We bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Draye

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This helped with what I think may be Tinea Versicolor. I used it and right away I saw the discoloration lessen and disappear after a day. I also used this in conjunction with the ointment. The smell is strong, being pregnant I almost gagged the first few times but I got use to it. It lingers only for a little while, once your clothed and out and about it disappears. Overall I am happy with this natural product. I also have eczema, so using the same ointment with this helped with the dryness that was left after using this. I maybe applied it 2x a day to keep the dryness away in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that helps with itchy skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has really sensitive skin and problems with cracked itchy feet. Every soap makes him so itchy! I tried this product just hoping it would help. It has greatly! He is on the second bottle. He says it doesn’t bubble up as regular soap, but it still does make suds. He likes the aroma. It is pretty strong, but he likes it. The best part is it eases his itchy skin! It’s a great quality product that ships quickly, arrives well sealed, and works to ease his itchy skin. His feet are visually less reddened and less itchy too!
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree, but hard to say if its actually antifungal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help a child with a fungal skin irritation - pediatrician recommended tea tree oil. It certainly smells like tea tree. The consistency is a bit thinner than expected. The bottles are a bit smaller than expected also. Didn't see much improvement in the child's skin irritation. Perhaps it works differently for different people. It does smell nice and moisturize a bit. I might purchase again if it were a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed in how small this was when received in the mail. Seems a little pricey for what you get. I’ve been getting rashes and ringworm on my legs and hoped this would clear it up. I’ve been using for a couple months now and haven’t seen any changes. Also smells a little too much like Vick’s vapor rub.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Declined in quality
customer_reviews.text: The first two bottles of this that I purchased were very nice. This last bottle was so watery and not gel-ish consistency. It’s so watery I can barley keep it in my hand to apply to my feet. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly Elvira

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had a horrible rash at least since Jan. 2020. The dermatologist hasn't been able to give him anything to get rid of it. Even after a biopsy, they still aren't sure where it came from! I can't swear that this wash has been what helped, but it has started to fade since about the same time he's been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product since there are many reviews that say good and bad on it. I have suffered with acne on the back of my head for a year or two and have become very self conscience in regards to it. I applied this product multiple times a day and while I still have a little bit of acne, it has cleared up about 85%. I don't feel like I have to wear hats everywhere now which is a huge deal to me. I just bought another bottle and would recommend this product. It doesn't solve the problem - but it does help.
customer_reviews.author: VanDzne

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash my feet. As any liquid body wash, a loofa or wash rag greatly increases the lathering production. As an added bonus I had a pretty bad sunburn when opening my pool, I swear this stuff really seemed to help with the sunburn. Seemed to eliminate itching, burning, peeling and increased healing time.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rosacea!!
customer_reviews.text: I have Rosacea caused by mites. This product has really helped clear up my skin when my Rosacea acne travels to my neck & chest. I also have dry eyes associated with mites & Rosacea. I put a little of this body wash on a wash cloth and wipe my eyelids am & pm, then rinse with water. Has significantly reduced the itchy, dryness of my eyes. However, I do not use it as a face wash - I use a separate product for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kato12

customer_reviews.title: Good for sweaty sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I've been using this product for a couple weeks. Ever since upping one of my prescriptions, I sweat like crazy in my sleep, and therefore, can sometimes have a smell in the common areas. I shower with this every day and I've noticed a marked improvement in smell. You can definitely smell the tea tree oil in the body wash, which I think that's the main active ingredient that helps. Overall, I would at least recommend anyone struggling with BO, itch, flakiness, etc. to give it a go!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wash for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: #Pros: - You heard it right. It's tea tree oil but it's very delicate. Good for sensitive skin. - It moisturizes well and doesn't dry out after wash. - Mild scent, almost none sense. Haha. - The calluses on my heel don't grow out as fast! Usually, I use my electric shaver once a month. But this product has been keeping my calluses at bay for months. - Reduce skin itchiness/redness if you have any. Add it to your skincare routine and bye bye that itchy feel. #Cons: - Bottle is smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: GPbo

customer_reviews.title: All over body wash
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my feet in an effort to prevent any smell or fungus, but I found that it works for a variety of body parts! I use this now as an all over body wash because I love the smell (almost has a mint after smell for me) and on the places I've used it I've seen an improvement of blemishes and it seems to be helping me not break out. I don't know that this will work for everyone, but I have used it for a couple months now and continue to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Claims one thing in the description but doesn’t back any of it up on the bottle label.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet but got it today. The reason I paid $15 for this small bottle was the description said it was good for or treated athletes foot and many many other things. Looking at the bottle there is no mention of any of these things to be treated and in fact on the bottle it doesn’t even say anti-fungal at all. Just says tea tree oil. And the very first ingredient is purified water. I will not pay $15 again for this product. I just feel like I paid big money for the description on amazon and got something else. Maybe I’m wrong but nothing to back it up just bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My go-to everyday foot scrub
customer_reviews.text: I battled with athletes foot for over a year and use this, along with a pretty stiff bristle brush, for daily maintenance. After trying a lot of different ointments, soaks, etc., only Lotrimin seemed to actually get things under control but needed something less powerful for daily use. It's been months using only this product and I can't express how nice it is to no longer have the burning, cracking, mess anymore. A little goes a long way. Love the scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Bandolier

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have ordered this product so you know I love it! This order was actually to give to my daughter. I find it so easy to use in the shower with a nail brush, and the bottoms of my feet get so clean ( you know, summer sandals and all) and feel just so GOOD after using it. I will ALWAYS keep this in my shower. What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Brust

customer_reviews.title: It's worked wonders for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a latex allergy from elastic in garments that really flares up sometimes. I've avoided doctors visits for years just by using over the counter cortisone cream as needed for the occasional flare up. A month or so ago that wasn't working so well anymore. I found this on Amazon and decided to give it a try. No lie - it started calming down my skin after the first time I used it. A day later I felt even better and the redness was fading fast. This stuff has been a godsend. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps to soothe my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: In the last few years I've been prone to dry, itchy skin and mild fungal infections especially in the fall and winter months, possibly due to higher amounts of chlorine added by my municipal water provider. I've found that using this body wash really helps to ease the irritation of my sensitive skin. I order it a few times a year so that I always have some on hand, though the product seems to last quite a while and just a little bit goes a long way in my morning shower. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUSBAND ALLERGIC BROKE OUT ALL OVER SO SPOT CHECK FIRST
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. After using once he broke out in whelp all over his body. Had to give him Benadryl 50mg to lessen the itch and reaction itself. The smell was marginally acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: terri m.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but the smell is kinda horrible
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in combination of an anti fungal cream when my arm pits broke out in a rash. Not sure if I can totally thank the wash, but I’m sure it helped with the quick healing. Would definitely recommend for others to try. I’m not a fan of the smell though. If you’re into really earthy smells, then this probably is fine. However, the smell is almost sickening to me. The peppermint oil saves it for me because otherwise I would have probably thrown this out. It could use some tweaking on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kinipela Nikol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad feet, have had many injuries, surgeries, bunions, etc. I decided I wanted to try something other than Epsom salts and this had very good reviews. Bottom line, I love this product! My feet feel great, healthy, stronger, and refreshed. I soak them at least once a week and feel so relaxed. I shall continue to purchase and give to family and friends! Please make a larger bottle! Next is showering, hand soaks, etc. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: KKMA

customer_reviews.title: I didn't care for the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Family member who used it due to a ringworm problem, said it seemed to help. It felt good on the scalp as a shampoo, and had an refreshing tingle that tea tree / menthol give. I didn't care for the smell, not sure what is was, but.... We both like the John Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Shampoo & bar much better. I don't think we will buy this again even tho the all natural was a plus. I just did not care for the smell and one must enjoy the smell of their family.
customer_reviews.author: Tah

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff. It doesn't cure nail fungus.
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for a while and it didn't make a dent in my nail fungus. A prescription for Terbinafine is the only treatment I've had any luck with. I can't speak to any of its other purported uses. If you are trying to clear up the formidable nail fungus then I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HandsomePete

customer_reviews.title: Effective body wash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help soothe the residual neuralgia from shingles. The itching and tingling was driving me crazy. I bathed with this and it helped immensely. The odor of the wash was not that great (3 stars) but it didn’t seem to remain on my body after rinsing. The overall effects of the wash lasted several hours but eventually wore off. But at least it gave me relief for severs hours. Just wish it lasted longer. Still a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had a mild case of ringworm that kept popping up all summer. The individual rashes went away with topical medication, but I wanted something to make sure it didn't come back. After a week of using this consistently the peeling skin all over my foot (and probably the source of the ringworm) is basically gone. Really glad that this problem had an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kills the Funk
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works well. I've tried others,but nothing comes close. Scrub your feet and balls with regular soap, rinse and then lather and let this soap soak for 10-30 seconds, then rinse and dry completely and your good to go. My feet used to smell so bad I could smell them while standing up(I'm 6'4") I know no longer feel embarrassed when I have to take my shoes off
customer_reviews.author: B.N

customer_reviews.title: Superbly Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tea tree oil body wash I have used. Tea tree oil products are a delicate art that involves precision and balance and this one has it right in all ways. Smooths, soothes, and cleans my sensitive skin well. It can be used every day, but with the expense I only use it when I feel it's needed (or every day leading up to an event). When not using this I use a mild tea tree body wash from Renpure that is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't initially expect much. It was a recommended product to treat toe nail fungus, among other things, but I was really pleased and surprised with the product when I received it. This stuff smells great and feels terrific on skin. It moisturizes extremely well. It just feels really good, so that was an unanticipated surprise. And I received it quickly after I ordered it as well. It's still early, but so far it exceeds my expectations. Good stuff. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Beier

customer_reviews.title: product really grew on me
customer_reviews.text: I thought a bath wash was all the same until I used this. Now that I out, I'm really missing it. it seems to exfoliate without any abrasives which I didnt even think that was possible. strong good smell. wakes me up in AM. leaves skin soft. I used it because I had itching and it did help a great deal. try it. If you dont like mint smells you should pass because its got tea tree in it and smells like mint. really liked this stuff
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work the way I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: Well let me say this, I should’ve payed closer attention to the size of the bottle because when it came in the mail I felt dumb. I would’ve gotten over it if it it helped to clear my body acne but it didn’t. It does work well for after shaving though. I just lather it on my legs after shaving, rinse and there is no irritation. I would recommend buying tea tree oil and adding it to a body soap to save money. Be mindful of measurements of course.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: helpful and pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I now live in a subtropical climate and I am bothered by small skin lesions which my doctor said are likely fungal. I was familiar with tea tree oil and ordered this soap though I wasn't sure if I could use it as I have sensitive skin. I have been using it for a week and although they haven't disappeared yet, the skin lesions have become much less noticeable and feel as though they are drying up and getting smaller. To my surprise however my skin at large did not dry out or have any negative reactions to the product and I am using it now as my shower or tub soap overall.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Blinn

customer_reviews.title: Cured toe fungus
customer_reviews.text: Had a malformed toenail warped and discolored by fungus. Hung loose and easily snagged. Had taken prescription given by doctor which had horrible side effects and did not cure the fungus in the least. Had tried various soaks, creams, and sprays all to no avail. Then, using only this soap on my feet on a regular basis when I showered, the fungus went away and toenail grew back normal.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: My Podiatrist was right
customer_reviews.text: Finally.. After years of messing around with numerous toe nail fungus products and half effective remedie$.. Scrub and scrub.. After one week and some patience.. Visible positive results.. Not only on the toes but many other uses on the body. Add to your shampoo and feel and see some nice results. Dandruff..?.. Gone. Scalp never ever looked so good... On and on.. Highly recommend as a daily wash. Use your imagination (BTW.. I gave this 4 *s because nothing is "perfect")
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells nauseating
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stinks so badly it's difficult to breathe in the shower. While I'm a big fan of tea tree body wash, this particular body wash smells absolutely horrid. I'll go back to purchasing the tea tree body wash in larger sizes. Larger sizes are actually less expensive and larger sizes are not so horribly pungent as this particular brand. Seriously, I put this stuff on my loofah and started to scrub up when the odor nearly made me vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: This Antifungal ant bacterial soap is soooo great. Husband had ringworm on his arms and I got this stuff and it's helped clear it. It smells really fresh and makes you feel fresh too! We even started using it in our hair for dry irritated scalp. I'm extremely sensitive in my lady bits and unlike some other reviews this does not burn down there but cleared up some irritation I was having. LOVE IT! Just got my second bottle
customer_reviews.author: Dennis's gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Bought it for my vacation where I knew I’d be sweating a lot. It definitely eliminated all body odor and was super gentle on my skin. It also helped clear up some eczema flare ups. Only thing I can say I didn’t care for is the scent but tee tree oil is known for that. The scent does fade after showering though
customer_reviews.author: Iesha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smell refreshing
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommend me this body wash when I started training Jiu Jitsu. I also bought the bar soap to wash my face. Body feels refreshing and feet very soft. I used this body wash only when I train Jiu jitsu to avoid any athletes foot or fungus. It also helps with any rash which I tend to get around my chin and forehead. It minimized the redness or it makes it go away after few wash. I bought my second bottle. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: The best tea tree oil soap I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the creamy consistency of this product. A lot of times I have bought tea tree oil soaps and they're very liquidy. This has worked great on my contacter husband, who has sensitive skin; he gets a lot of skin irritants from stuff on the job. I've also use this for my son who plays outside and loves to pet every wild animal. It has worked wonderfully for bug bites and rashes. I'm glad that I purchased this product. It's definitely worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Messer

customer_reviews.title: You can buy the same product double the quantity at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Amazon you guys do just fine delivery was perfect communication was fantastic and the product was received with no trouble. I bought basically the same thing at Walmart double the size less the money Inn at work for a couple weeks. This size I thought I was getting to my opinion was not even close to what I should have paid. Went riding to treat a skin condition you want something that's going to work and last I was able to use that three showers. Not really knocking the product but knocking the hell out of price and the quantity I will not order that product that you can thank you. Sincerely Jeff
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brink

customer_reviews.title: I do not love the smell of Tea Tree oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks now and so far, it's ok. I do not love the smell of Tea Tree oil, but I already knew that, and I'm fine with it. I am just not sure if it actually helps treating anything - so far it seems pretty much like any other soap. Not good, not bad, just soap.
customer_reviews.author: Mr/Mrs Aa

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, I really like the stuff and it works well for what I bought it for however my third bottle is not the same stuff. The first two bottles had a whitish color and the consistency wasn't thick or thin, about right I guess for being the first time using it. The third bottle was clear, runny and not as strong as the other two. I'm hoping this is just an off batch and will try ordering more. Please work on providing a consistent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy body orders and skin rashes
customer_reviews.text: I use this typically at night if you've ever smelled tea tree oil it does have a tea tree oil smell and therefore that's why I use it at night before bed because it's not a fragrance I would particularly like to wear around during the day. I am prone to getting workout rashes from sweating and heat this has completely eliminated that. It also helps eliminate heavy body odors especially after working out. It just gives me an overall clean feeling and it does help with those rashes I've experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using while deployed, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quick results. I am deployed military and work 12 to 14 hour days with boots on for about 16 hours a day. This product has made a significant difference in the condition of my feet. I use it daily and it helps control dryness, athletes foot, and overall health of my skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TN.

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I just happened upon this product, read the reviews and decided to give it a try. So glad I did!!! It's embarrassing to always be itchy, especially in public situations.I've never been diagnosed with any 'condition' that I would have searched, either. I have used a bazillion different moisturizers and soaps that didn't help. Now my skin is not itchy and is nice and moisturized!!! Also, I agree with everyone else that the smell is wonderful!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: artnhome

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years. The first time I bought it, I needed something to help with the rash that kept developing underneath my breasts during the hot summer months. It helped me get rid of the rash in just a few days. My boyfriend used this wash on a rash that developed on his stomach and it also cleared that up. I also frequently use underneath my arms! This stuff leaves your skin feeling tingly and fresh. I love the fresh smell. Highly recommend! I will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I was seriously amazed! I have ordered another bottle
customer_reviews.text: IF I COULD GIVE THIS TEN STARS I WOULD! I work in a very hot environment and have been battling with jock itch for a while. Our clinic has described so many things and none worked. Until now. In just 2 days after using ANTIFUNGAL TEA TREE OIL BODY WASH that itch was a thing of the past. I was seriously amazed! I have ordered another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Da Don

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something that would keep the fungus off my toenails.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like it for my feet. It really stops the itching and it does seem to keep the fungus from growing back in the corners of my toenails. I'm hoping it will help me to keep the fungus from coming back this winter when I wear closed toe shoes and socks. Also, I tried it on my itchy scalp, and it seems to help there too. I'll have to let you know on the moisturizing and sensitive skin qualities. I've only used it for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: worked for me
customer_reviews.text: this seems to be a terrific product. been troubled by a foot rash and this stuff with nightly use took care of it. scent is a bit powerful but I'm about results ... refreshing and I trust the quality because the company seems to be quite customer satisfaction oriented. I would recommend this product as a foot wash if you have an issue or even as a monthly or weekly wash too keep all well. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a man that likes the smell of brake cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 2 days so I don't know if it does all that it claims and I'm not sure I will ever be able to answer that because it smells like I am using brake cleaner as a soap! Some guys may find that appealing so if you are looking for a man that works with his hands use this soap! But I find the smell repulsive so I have to say this soap isn't for me!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for years. I stocked up the last time so it has been a while since I bought it last. Disappointed this time. It used to come I’m a bigger bottle, and I could get two of the bigger bottles for the same price as this 9 oz bottle. Now reading the reviews it sounds like they changed the product ingredients as well as the size for the price. Looks like at about the same time that Dial had to take “antibacterial” off of their packaging. Oh well. Back to the drawing board to find another natural anti fungal that works. $15 lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: BR808

product_meta.title: Antifungal Tea Tree Oil Body Wash, Helps Athletes Foot, Ringworm, Toenail Fungus, Jock Itch, Acne, Eczema & Body Odor- Soothes Itching & Promotes Healthy Feet, Skin and Nails 9oz
feature_bullets: 🌿 GET RID OF FUNGUS FOR GOOD: Our #1 Product for over 7 years! A must for treating the worst cases of Athletes Foot, Nail Fungus, Jock Itch, Yeast, Ringworm and Tinea Versicolor. Our Extra Strength Natural Tea Tree Foot & Body Wash is Formulated with a blend of 100% Pure Essential oils….Not Synthetic Fragrances! Gentle enough for those with sensitive skin, psoriasis and eczema.

🌿 ONLY THE BEST FOR SMELLY FOOT & BODY ODOR: Our Customers love our wash for kicking out the worst of Foot & Body Odor. A sure way to combat odor from Overactive Sweat Glands in the Groin and Armpits leaving your skin clean and refreshed. A must for those who love the gym or sweat hard at work.

🌿 KIDS & TEENS: Loved by Parents with kids in contact sports such as wrestling and martial arts to keep fungus at bay. Another great use is for Lice Prevention! Parents have been using our wash for years to keep those little buggers away!
🌿 ITCHY SCALP: Our Wash is not just for your Feet & Body… but is excellent for addressing Dry, Flaky, Burning and Itchy Scalps.

🌿 ADDRESSES BODY ACNE: Our Natural Extra Strength Body Wash addresses troublesome Body Acne. Cleanses clogged pores while helping to reduct oils and bacteria build up, which can lead to acne. Used by mature adults and teens gentle enough for those with sensitive skin
